classifiers: Topic :: Internet :: WWW/HTTP :: Dynamic Content :: CGI Tools/Libraries
Topic :: Internet :: WWW/HTTP :: Dynamic Content :: Message Boards
Topic :: Internet :: WWW/HTTP :: Dynamic Content :: News/Diary
Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
SCT (Sphene Community Tools) is a collection of Django applications that are
designed to be easily pluggable into any Django project. It currently consists
of a Wiki and a Forum application. It contains an example project that allows
users to create a community Web site containing the Wiki and Board applications
without any further coding/configuration changes.
info.keywords: forum wiki board sphene community tools sct django python blog linklist software
info.name: Sphene-Community-Tools
info.summary: SCT (Sphene Community Tools) is a collection of Django applications. It currently consists of a Wiki and Forum application which are applicable for communities, support forums, blogs, etc.
info.html_description: SCT (Sphene Community Tools) is a collection of Django applications that are designed to be easily pluggable into any Django project. It currently consists of a Wiki and a Forum application. It contains an example project that allows users to create a community Web site containing the Wiki and Board applications without any further coding/configuration changes.
